item.title: Self-Cleaning Earbuds?? - LG Tone Free FN6
item.description:
Duration: 10:51 (651s)
Views: 419577
Likes: 20175
Thanks to LG for sponsoring this video! TONE Free FN6 (UK): https://bit.ly/ShortCircuit_LGTONEFree_FN6_UK TONE Free FN6 (US): https://bit.ly/ShortCircuit_LGTONEFree_FN6_US
These are surprisingly really good with an awesome twist using UV technology.
DISCLAIMER: UVnano charging case ‚Äúkills 99.9% of bacteria‚Äù limiting only to the speaker mesh part of the earbud not the entire earbud. The blue lighting shown when the charging case is opened is not the UV light, but it is a blue mood lighting for aesthetic purposes. The UVnano light kills 99.9% of E. Coli & S. aureus bacteria on the speaker mesh part of the earbuds. It does not clean or disinfect the earbuds. It takes approximately 5~10 minutes for the bacteria to be killed while it is in the charging cradle, it does not kill the bacteria instantly. item.title: Linus let me spend $10,000 on THIS!!! - Pantone Plus Plastic Standard Chips Collection
item.description:
Duration: 13:53 (833s)
Views: 3545550
Likes: 138040
Get $25 off all pairs of Vessi Footwear with offer code shortcircuit at https://www.vessi.com/shortcircuit
Linus isn't a FAN of us spending money, but when we need it, he is willing to loosen those purse strings. item.description:
Duration: 09:56 (596s)
Views: 742291
Likes: 22697
Check out the Sharge ICEMAG at https://bit.ly/48WiCrQ
AMD has been pretty quiet about the entry-level 8600G and 8700G CPUs, but why? With reduced PCIe lanes, Zen4c cores, a pretty beefy built-in GPU, and an accessible price when compared to buying a GPU, these new chips seem like they could be great choices for those looking to dip their toes into PC gaming. Linus is here to see if they're worth your hard-earned money.
